alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Lumpkin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 4:23PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy rainfall will impact portions of west central Lumpkin and north central Dawson Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 422 PM EDT, moderate to heavy rainfall was occurring over Len Foote Hike Inn, or 11 miles west of Dahlonega. This area of rainfall was nearly stationary. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Nimblewill, Len Foote Hike Inn and Black Gap Shelter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
